original_text: The Lord created the heavens. He is the true God. He created the earth and he put it in its place. He built it to be strong. He did not create it as an empty place. He made it for people to live there. He says, ‘I am the Lord. There is nobody else who is like me. The Lord created the heavens. He is the true God. He created the earth and he put it in its place. He built it to be strong. He did not create it as an empty place. He made it for people to live there. He says, ‘I am the Lord. There is nobody else who is like me. The Lord created the heavens. He is the true God. He created the earth and he put it in its place. He built it to be strong. He did not create it as an empty place. He made it for people to live there. He says, ‘I am the Lord. There is nobody else who is like me. The Lord created the heavens. He is the true God. He created the earth and he put it in its place. He built it to be strong. He did not create it as an empty place. He made it for people to live there. He says,
korean_text: 대저 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하시되 하늘을 창조하신 이 그는 하나님이시니 그가 땅을 지으시고 그것을 만드셨으며 그것을 견고하게 하시되 혼돈하게 창조하지 아니하시고 사람이 거주하게 그것을 지으셨으니 나는 여호와라 나 외에 다른 이가 없느니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord created the heavens.
He is the true God.
He created the earth
and he put it in its place.
He built it to be strong.
He did not create it as an empty place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것을 빈 곳으로 창조하지 않으셨다.

sentences.original_text: He made it for people to live there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들이 거기서 살도록 그것을 만드셨다.

sentences.original_text: He says,
'I am the Lord.
There is nobody else who is like me.'
